transcript: one of my favorite ways to make content is to talk about my favorite way rather than say this is the best way and when you say it that way you don't seem like a dick because you're saying this is my favorite way instead of saying how to build a seven-figure agency you say how I built a seven-figure agency the difference is you're not projecting anything onto anyone you're sharing what you learned I'm sharing my favorite way to get new customers I'm sharing my favorite way to use outbound not the three only ways or the three best ways because those people will argue with you on but if you say this is my favorite what can they say and that allows you to make way better content without getting the hate
